grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 肘関節【チュウカンセツ】elbow joint
肘頭滑液嚢炎【チュウトウカツエキノウエン】olecranoid bursitis, miner's elbow
掣肘【セイチュウ】restraint, restriction, control
kun reading compounds: 肘当て【ひじあて】(detachable) elbow rest, arm rest, elbow pad, elbow strike (karate)
野球肘【やきゅうひじ】Little League elbow, pitcher's elbow, baseball elbow
